overview:
Oliver is a seasoned Venture Capitalist and , Founder, Interimsmanager from Switzerland, living in Munich, Germany.

Experience Cofounder Seedair (Mobile Social Media)

Partner, PT Capital, Munich (ICT)

Investment Director, T-Venture (Deutsche Telekom) Setting up US operations (Silicon Valley, Boston), settting up Israel operations, deputy of managing director, head of Bonn office, board seats in early stage and through IPO process, restructurings, exits

Experienced Project Manager, Head of Int. mandates, Grant Thornton Experienced Manager, Arthur Andersen

Project Manager Busiiness Development, Thyssen Handelsunion (GSM, ICT)
